class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL; contact candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list)) (ONLINE: live synchronous meeting Mondays 6:30pm-8:00pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: A study of Christian reflection on sexual ethics. Attention will be given to the embodied nature of the human person, the notions of sin and grace, sexual difference, and topics such as sexual violence.
